Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Blp1 (Gly-rich; natural AMPs; class 2b two-chain bacteriocins; UCLL2a, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes)

Literature Information.Literature: Shown is the sequence of chain a(AFH56943). For chain b,see AFH56945. This peptide was detected in the supernatant with antibacterial activity accrording to the authors. No MIC found. Further characterization is needed. Updated 7/2021.
Literature Information.Author: Busarcevic M, Dalgalarrondo M.2012
Literature Information.Reference: Int J Antimicrob Agents. 2012 Jun 25 Online.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Purification and genetic characterisation of the novel bacteriocin LS2 produced by the human oral strain Lactobacillus salivarius BGHO1
